statements: SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_description FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor_name LIKE '%Smith%' AND course_name ILIKE 'data%';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor_name FROM courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE instructor_name = 'Jane Doe' ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM courses WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY course_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses;
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT course_name AS Name, course_description AS Description FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_id > 2 AND course_id < 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS TotalCourses FROM Courses;
SELECT * FROM course_materials;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course_materials;
SELECT course_id, student_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_birthdate < '2000-01-01';
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id JOIN course_materials ON enrollments.course_id = course_materials.course_id;
SELECT * FROM course_materials;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course_materials WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_birthdate >= '2000-01-01';

SELECT course_name, student_name, enrollment_date FROM course_materials JOIN enrollments ON course_materials.course_id = enrollments.course_id JOIN students ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;

SELECT enrollment_id, course_name, student_name, enrollment_date FROM enrollments JOIN course_materials ON enrollments.course_id = course_materials.course_id JOIN students ON enrollments.student_id = students.student_id ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_materials;
SELECT title, content FROM course_materials WHERE id = 3;
SELECT title, author FROM course_materials ORDER BY author DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, instructor FROM courses WHERE id % 2 = 0;
SELECT title, author FROM course_materials WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrolled_courses ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT title, description, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, title, content, author FROM course_materials WHERE title LIKE '%SQL%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM courses
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM students JOIN courses ON students.course_id = courses.course_id
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, course_name FROM assessments JOIN courses ON assessments.course_id = courses.course_id GROUP BY course_name
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN assessments ON students.student_id = assessments.student_id
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor FROM courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT course_id, material_type, material_url FROM course_materials WHERE material_type = 'lecture';
SELECT * FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, MAX(grade) AS max_grade FROM assessments GROUP BY student_id;
